column4: anyone feel like giving a noob a step by step walkthrough on how to get aim installed? I have gaim, but I'd like to get aim if I can
so your saying I wouldnt be able to get it through aptget, or sudo?
not unless they make a client, as far as I know AIM is closed source and does not make a linux client, and because it is closed source it can't be ported to linux
